topic.title: Orn.io
topic.body: I'm playing the browser game http://orn.io - anybody want to join me?

1531553708_19vrpYfbpF3tjxEyD8UWULtqcmmKG.body: Hopefully it will be on ZeroNet soon!

> [quantumkitty](#comment_172_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEaQbNZu): I gotta love how simple games with simple-looking graphics (e.g. Minecraft, etc.) are becoming just as popular as all the flashy games with realistic, high-end graphics. lol

Agreed, I think that the aspect of multiplayer in casual games is what makes them so fun - competing against real people and winning gives you a good feeling that you don't get when playing against AI.

> [styromaniac](#comment_38_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): he graphics focus really hard on one aspect and fail on a

That's true, for me I would rather have fun gameplay with bad graphics rather than lousy gameplay in HD.

> [r00t3d](#comment_3_1JYm2YGNSZxAzRR3cdwwWBcDLYNci5rG8f): so fun, but make it more faster maybe fun :v

Do you mean movement speed, or the frame rate of the game?
